title: Episode 877 - Special Guest SSG Earl Granville
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Wounded warrior and motivational speaker Earl Granville discusses his service in the National Guard and joining ten days before 9/11, the intense details about the day he lost his leg in Afghanistan, losing his twin brother and fellow veteran to suicide,...
itunes:summary:
Wounded warrior and motivational speaker Earl Granville discusses his service in the National Guard and joining ten days before 9/11, the intense details about the day he lost his leg in Afghanistan, losing his twin brother and fellow veteran to suicide, and what he does now to help veterans and others improve their lives.
